br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers
Class Indent

java.lang.Object
  br.com.concepting.framework.util.helpers.Indent
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaIndent, JSPIndent
public abstract class Indent
extends java.lang.Object

Classe que define a estrutura básica para regras de indentação.

Since:
1.0
Author:
fvilarinho
